constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 12 (Thursday, January 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. POSEY:
H.R. 414.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article l, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution, which grants Congress the authority ``To make
all Laws, and all other Powers vested by this Constitution in
the Government of the United States, or in any Department or
Officer thereof''
[Page H225]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Public Service Integrity Act
